degen.description: Degenerate gambler who apes into brand-new meme coins and high-APY farms without due diligence.
degen.default_scene: A frog-eyed degen launches into the void, charts exploding behind him, surrounded by glowing tokens – no parachute, just pure YOLO.

copium.description: The fictional drug inhaled to ease the pain of losses or missed pumps.
copium.default_scene: A character sits in ruins, hooked to a glowing "COPIUM" tank, staring blankly at a red chart – smoke rises like lost dreams.

diamond_hands.description: Holding through all volatility with unbreakable conviction.
diamond_hands.default_scene: In the eye of the storm, a lone figure stands firm on a cliff, clutching a shining coin, lightning illuminating their calm face.

fomo.description: Fear of Missing Out, buying impulsively to catch the pump.
fomo.default_scene: Trembling fingers hover over a 'BUY' button, while a rocket lifts off in the background – the price chart is a blur of green candles.

holding.description: Originated from the typo HODL; keep your coins no matter what.
holding.default_scene: Two figures sit inside a cozy bunker made of wallets, sipping tea, as the outside world crashes in a sea of red.

jeet.description: Just Exit Early Trader who cashes out at first dip.
jeet.default_scene: A trader bails out early with a tiny parachute as others ride a rocket – he looks back nervously while missing the moon.

rekt.description: Total loss through liquidation or rugpull.
rekt.default_scene: A scorched terminal flickers with liquidation alerts, smoke rising from a mouse – a stunned trader lies face down on a broken desk.

rugpull.description: Developers pull liquidity and disappear, leaving token worthless.
rugpull.default_scene: A neon-lit party turns to chaos as the dance floor vanishes beneath the crowd – the dev slips out the back with a moneybag.

valhalla.description: Mythic end goal where diamond hands finally pay off.
valhalla.default_scene: A golden gateway opens in the clouds – warriors with tokens raised march upward, led by glowing "diamond hands".

wagmi.description: Community rallying cry – We Are Gonna Make It!
wagmi.default_scene: A ragtag army of frogs, cats, and anons marches through crypto ruins – banners flying high with "WAGMI" as their battle cry.

revenge_pump.description: A strong comeback rally after a harsh dip or betrayal.
revenge_pump.default_scene: A phoenix made of candlesticks rises from the ashes of a dumped chart – its wings shimmer with vengeance.

thanks_for_playing.description: Sarcastic farewell after a loss or failed trade.
thanks_for_playing.default_scene: A sarcastic clown bows under falling confetti made of failed trade receipts – a neon sign above: "Thanks for Playing."

just_rugged.description: Sudden liquidity pull or dev dump right after launch.
just_rugged.default_scene: A launchpad explodes milliseconds after ignition – coins disintegrate mid-air, while a shadowy dev slips away.

snipers.description: High-frequency bots or traders dumping early after sniping launch.
snipers.default_scene: A battlefield at token launch: laser-eyed bots trigger early, while real holders crawl for cover behind charts.

retire_my_bloodline.description: Extreme emotional reaction to heavy losses.
retire_my_bloodline.default_scene: A lone trader kneels before a screen showing -99.99%, tears mixing with rain, an ancestral portrait fades behind him.

don't_farm.description: Skepticism toward yield farming, often sarcastic.
don't_farm.default_scene: A barren farming field with broken APY signs – in the distance, a lone figure digs by hand for a single coin.

work_hard_for_your_bags.description: Warning to not rely on passive yield; hustle for profits.
work_hard_for_your_bags.default_scene: A factory scene: exhausted workers hammer tokens on an assembly line – no shortcuts, only sweat for bags.

still_fading.description: Criticism of those who still doubt the token/project.
still_fading.default_scene: A skeptical trader stands outside a glowing portal labeled "MOON" while others leap through with smiles and tokens in hand.

dex_update_will_be_paid.description: Updates that benefit holders will have financial impact.
dex_update_will_be_paid.default_scene: A mystical forge glows as devs craft golden coins – above them, a DEX logo pulses with growing energy.

these_streets_are_brutal.description: Comment on how rough the market is.
these_streets_are_brutal.default_scene: Dark neon city alleys filled with broken charts, desperate traders, and scam signs – graffiti reads: "Only the strong survive."

gg_mfers.description: Game over. Usually after a big loss or rug.
gg_mfers.default_scene: A spinning gamer chair faces a busted trading setup – on the monitor: "GG MFers – see you next cycle."

on_to_the_next_one.description: Quick shift to next hype/token after loss or exit.
on_to_the_next_one.default_scene: A trader with a half-packed bag walks away from burning charts toward a flickering ad for the "Next Big Thing."

giga_send.default_scene: An entire stadium watches as a rocket bursts from a giant green candlestick – the air crackles with raw hype.

holder_count_still_growing.description: Despite price drop, belief in growth continues.
holder_count_still_growing.default_scene: A forest of tiny wallet trees grows despite the storm – each new leaf glows with a fresh wallet address.

great_narrative.default_scene: A red-carpet premiere for a token story – posters of dragons, heroes, and moons decorate a crowd of eager holders.
